scripts.prebuild: npm run prettier:check && npm run lint
scripts.e2e:ci: docker run --rm -i -e TEST_BASE_URL=http://localhost:6006 -e CI=true -v ./playwright-report:/app/playwright-report -v ./test-results:/app/test-results -v ./storybook-static:/app/storybook-static -v ./tests:/app/tests -v ./playwright.config.ts:/app/playwright.config.ts cm-designsystem-visual-testing sh -c "npx http-server /app/storybook-static -p 6006 & npx playwright test"
scripts.e2e:test: npm run build-storybook & docker run --rm -i -e TEST_BASE_URL=http://localhost:6006 -e CI=true -v ./playwright-report:/app/playwright-report -v ./test-results:/app/test-results -v ./storybook-static:/app/storybook-static -v ./tests:/app/tests -v ./playwright.config.ts:/app/playwright.config.ts cm-designsystem-visual-testing sh -c "npx http-server /app/storybook-static -p 6006 & npx playwright test"
scripts.e2e:update: npm run build-storybook & docker run --rm -i -e TEST_BASE_URL=http://localhost:6006 -e CI=true -v ./playwright-report:/app/playwright-report -v ./test-results:/app/test-results -v ./storybook-static:/app/storybook-static -v ./tests:/app/tests -v ./playwright.config.ts:/app/playwright.config.ts cm-designsystem-visual-testing sh -c "npx http-server /app/storybook-static -p 6006 & npx playwright test --update-snapshots"
